Class ContextClientCodeException

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class ContextClientCodeException
extends Exception
    Thrown when we encounter a problem with client code in a context.

                          Optional<String> parentID,

        Parameters:
        contextID - the ID of the failed context.
        parentID - the ID of the failed context's parent, if any.
